'''Tidal Illusion''' is [[Eula]]'s Level 1 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This stat buff is additive with other [[Damage Bonus|DMG% bonuses]].
* The effects of this Constellation are indicated by the glowing of the weapon and a wing mark.
